name: tm56
effect: Teaches Fling to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Fling to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user flings its held item at the
foe to attack. Its power and effects
depend on the item.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user flings its held item at the
foe to attack. Its power and effects
depend on the item.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user flings its held item at the
foe to attack. Its power and effects
depend on the item.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user flings its held item at the
target as an attack. Its power and
effects depend on the item.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user flings its held item at the
target as an attack. Its power and
effects depend on the item.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user flings its held item at the target
to attack. This move’s power and effects
depend on the item.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user flings its held item at the target to attack.
This move’s power and effects depend on the item.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user flings its held item at the target to attack.
This move’s power and effects depend on the item.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the
opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokémon
that switch into battle.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
After making its attack, the user rushes back to
switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.
